entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
